title: Tofu & bean burgers with radish apple slaw

ingredients.item: 200g pack Taifun Smoked Tofu With Almonds & Sesame Seeds
400g can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
150g Waitrose French Breakfast Radishes, thinly sliced or shredded
1 Jazz apple, cored and thinly sliced
4 tsp fresh Waitrose Lime & Amarillo Chilli Dressing

instructions.step: Preheat the grill to high. Put the tofu into a processor, and chop until very fine. Add the peanut butter, beans, coriander stems and plenty of seasoning then pulse to roughly chop the beans. Shape into 4 burgers.
Place the burgers on a non-stick baking tray and grill for 5 minutes on each side, until hot through and golden. Meanwhile, toss the radish, onion, apple and coriander leaves with the lime dressing.
Toast the flatbreads to warm through. Serve the burgers in the breads, topped with 1 tsp barbecue sauce and a spoonful of slaw, serving the rest on the side.
